body: #### PR description: * Complete migration of a DDEcalBarrelNewAlgo class ***ASIS*** _Note_: there are known issues which will be listed and discussed during Sim meeting: units, CLHEP, code modernisation, etc. Please, open an issue for other comments after that discussion.
